description: This is an HTML file implementing a web interface for visualizing and interacting with database data. It includes embedded CSS styling and JavaScript for dynamic behavior such as loading databases, tables, and table data, as well as UI interactions like expanding cells and refreshing data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Handles the refresh action for the database list, triggers reloading of databases.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show/hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data from a selected table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the table data into an HTML table with clickable cells for expanding content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cells, handling large text and object data types, making cells clickable for expansion.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better readability, including JSON objects and long strings.
